title: Gourimadi Prehistoric Settlement
description: Survey and site excavation have provided evidence for a likely prehistoric settlement (possibly fortified) on the Gourimadi hill in the Katsaronio plain in the Karystia, southern Euboea, Greece.

properties.description: Coordinates from Chronique, verified in Tankosić 2021a and against Google Earth (imagery date 8/8/2019). Dates after Tankosić 2021a.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Gourimadi excavation
